channel.title: CVE Feed for Macrium -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Macrium -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10143|2024-08-04T10:50:57.907Z -- macrium -- reflect
item.description: Macrium Reflect includes an OpenSSL component that specifies an OPENSSLDIR variable as C:\openssl\. Macrium Reflect contains a privileged service that uses this OpenSSL component. Because unprivileged Windows users can create subdirectories off of the system root, a user can create the appropriate path to a specially-crafted openssl.cnf file to achieve arbitrary code execution with SYSTEM privileges.
